## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run linting tools (`flake8`, `black`)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error conditions

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, docstrings, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary
- [ ] Any dependent documentation has been updated

### Branch Protection Compliance
- [ ] This PR is from a feature/fix branch (not from main)
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the latest main branch
- [ ] I have resolved any merge conflicts
- [ ] All CI checks are passing (or I've addressed failures)

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I haven't committed sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date and secure
